meanings: order, arrangement, adjustment, 정돈하다 arrange, put in order, set[put] to rights, order, adjust
a standstill, a deadlock, a stalemate, 정돈하다 come to a standstill, reach a deadlock, reach the end of the road
tidy (up), straighten (up), clear up, put[set] (sth) in order, arrange

vlive.korean: 그 정돈 아니야아! It's not that bad! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [CIX] ~호로로록 쭈와아아압 막내즈의 우당탕탕 무국물 마시기~ (JINYOUNG&HYUNSUK drinking chicken radish soup)
피부가 정말 화사하게 정돈이 되었죠? It creates natural and fresh glow. 듣기 View video EMMA BEAUTY : [화보장인엠마] 시세이도 글로우 쿠션 & 톤업 쿠션으로 완성하는 맑고 투명한 광채 스킨
vlive.english: It creates natural and fresh glow.

vlive.korean: [오른쪽 정리 정돈 합격] - 괜찮죠? - 괜찮죠? [Right side is clean] - It's okay... - It's okay? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.103
vlive.english: [Right side is clean] - It's okay... - It's okay?

vlive.korean: 피부결이 뭔가 정돈된 느낌이죠? It seems that it evens my skin tone. 듣기 View video SmileJ : [해외에서 난리난 연예인 스킨케어] 유튜버가 행사에 초대 받으면? 선물 받은 제품 언박싱
vlive.english: It seems that it evens my skin tone.

vlive.korean: 우리는 마무리까지 깔끔하게 정리정돈을 해볼까? Shall we clean the kitchen table up? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉라면 챌린지②” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: Shall we clean the kitchen table up?

examples.korean: The house had been kept in good order. 발음듣기 그 집은 정돈이 잘 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house had been kept in good order. 발음

examples.korean: They sat in her neat and tidy kitchen. 발음듣기 그들은 그녀의 깔끔하게 정돈된 부엌에 앉아 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They sat in her neat and tidy kitchen. 발음

examples.korean: I spent all morning cleaning and tidying. 발음듣기 나는 청소하고 정돈하느라 오전을 다 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I spent all morning cleaning and tidying. 발음

examples.korean: Keep your room neat and clean. 발음듣기 방을 깨끗하게 정돈해 두어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Keep your room neat and clean. 발음

examples.korean: I like everything to be neat and tidy. 발음듣기 나는 모든 것이 깔끔하게 잘 정돈되어 있는 게 좋다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I like everything to be neat and tidy. 발음
